  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_94250</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_94250</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Magnetic field lines of an electromagnet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Magnetisch fangen Sie Zeilen eines 
Elektromagneten auf</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Lignes de champ magnétique d'un électro-aimant</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Linhas do campo magnético de um eletroímã</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Righe del campo magnetico di un elettromagnete</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γραμμές μαγνητικών πεδίων ενός ηλεκτρομαγνήτη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Líneas del campo magnético de un electroimán</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that the magnetic field lines of an electromagnet is the same as that of a bar magnet.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bar magnet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electromagnet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic field</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic field lines</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß die magnetischen 
Zeilen eines Elektromagneten ist dieselben wie das eines Stabmagneten 
auffangen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que les lignes de champ 
magnétique d'un électro-aimant est identiques que celle d'une barre 
aimantée.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que as linhas do campo 
magnético de um eletroímã são as mesmas que aquela de um ímã de 
barra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che le righe del 
campo magnetico di un elettromagnete è le stesse di quella di un 
magnete di barra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι οι γραμμές μαγνητικών 
πεδίων ενός ηλεκτρομαγνήτη είναι οι ίδιες με αυτόν ενός 
μαγνήτη ράβδων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que las líneas del 
campo magnético de un electroimán son iguales que la de un imán de 
barra.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stabmagnet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektromagnet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Magnet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">magnetisch fangen Sie auf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">magnetisch fangen Sie Zeilen auf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">barre aimantée</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">électro-aimant</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">aimant</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">champ magnétique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">lignes de champ magnétique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ímã de barra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">eletroímã</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ímã</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">campo magnético</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">linhas do campo magnético</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">magnete di barra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">elettromagnete</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">magnete</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">campo magnetico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">righe del campo magnetico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μαγνήτης ράβδων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ηλεκτρομαγνήτης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μαγνήτης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μαγνητικό πεδίο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραμμές μαγνητικών πεδίων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">imán de barra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">electroimán</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">campo magnético</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
